= Ubuntu Installation =
There are prebuild Ubuntu Packages available! Use the following commands to install Sonic Gesture on Ubuntu 10.04:
{{{
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:gijzelaar/sonicgesture
sudo apt-get install sonicgesture
}}}

To start run: */usr/bin/sonicgesture*.

= Source Installation =
Follow these instructions if you want to compile the latest development version of Sonic Gesture from source. This is for Linux and/or Mac.

== Requirements ==

You should install these packages with a package manager or compile them from source:

  * OpenCV 2.1+
  * QT 4.6+
  * cmake 2.0.8+
  * Subversion
  * Liblo

== Building ==

  * $ svn checkout https://sonic-gesture.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/sonic-gesture
  * $ cd sonic-gesture
  * $ mkdir build
  * $ cd build
  * $ cmake ..
  * $ make sonicgesture

== Running ==
This will result in a binary called sonicgesture. You can run this.
